concept.title: 12.4 Motions for Reconsideration in Rule 12 Appeals

conbody.p: Motions for reconsideration of appeals decided under either the Small Claims (Expedited) procedure or the Accelerated procedure need not be decided within the original 120-day or 180day limit, but all such motions will be processed and decided promptly so as to be consistent with the intent of this Rule.
